# Crypto: Collision Among Us 

**Author**: [4-krishna](https://github.com/4-krishna)<br>
**Points**: 120<br>
**Hint(s)**: None<br>
**Flag**: `xploit{15832-3645-24173}`<br>

**Challenge description:**
```
There is one impostor among them.

Flag format is
xploit{<file_name_without_extension>}
```

## Solve

The objective of the challenge is to find the one different file from every provided exe files. You can do this by checking its signature hashes.


When you check its md5sum hash, all files seems to be the same:
```bash

# md5sum *
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  12596-3051-16070.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  13046-26279-5127.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  13312-21101-19148.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  13824-27822-21034.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  15832-3645-24173.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  15849-30384-3434.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  15999-17275-4812.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  1671-11002-10687.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  17580-12781-24090.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  1982-18218-6482.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  19891-8042-4685.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  20017-12439-15426.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  20606-21731-31655.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  21813-13997-20701.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  22023-29325-12222.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  22380-1746-19775.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  22440-15448-25839.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  2251-5411-7389.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  25693-21685-15866.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  2591-23551-28360.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  26843-31664-8964.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  28674-18726-6159.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  29619-23712-10110.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  30212-20647-30423.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  31321-21272-18357.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  31709-32261-29002.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  31773-9793-2013.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  32397-5520-26033.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  32639-11398-13579.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  32673-19576-27581.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  3281-27044-31836.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  4371-28362-11056.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  4665-11747-32072.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  5054-18094-5765.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  6801-22135-9315.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  7216-10764-26687.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  8572-18998-6180.exe
cdc47d670159eef60916ca03a9d4a007  9548-22845-1548.exe


```

This is because there exists a hash collision here. You can easily solve this problem by using a different hash like sha1.

```bash

# sha1sum *

84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  12596-3051-16070.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  13046-26279-5127.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  13312-21101-19148.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  13824-27822-21034.exe
fa90bd7b1205c4dd452769f73e69108233726462  15832-3645-24173.exe <--- one different file
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  15849-30384-3434.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  15999-17275-4812.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  1671-11002-10687.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  17580-12781-24090.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  1982-18218-6482.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  19891-8042-4685.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  20017-12439-15426.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  20606-21731-31655.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  21813-13997-20701.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  22023-29325-12222.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  22380-1746-19775.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  22440-15448-25839.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  2251-5411-7389.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  25693-21685-15866.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  2591-23551-28360.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  26843-31664-8964.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  28674-18726-6159.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  29619-23712-10110.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  30212-20647-30423.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  31321-21272-18357.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  31709-32261-29002.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  31773-9793-2013.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  32397-5520-26033.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  32639-11398-13579.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  32673-19576-27581.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  3281-27044-31836.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  4371-28362-11056.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  4665-11747-32072.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  5054-18094-5765.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  6801-22135-9315.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  7216-10764-26687.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  8572-18998-6180.exe
84d0d03198b3952b7648d9ac468684fc42771a58  9548-22845-1548.exe
```


We got the file name of the unique file and hence the flag!
